events.message: I have filed an insurance claim after my car was involved in a collision on the highway yesterday.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident due to the vehicle collision reported in the documentation.
An agent has been assigned to handle my auto accident claim and will contact me to discuss next steps.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of my claim and confirmed the details of the car collision were noted.
The insurance agent requested additional documents including photos of the vehicle damage and a police accident report.
I have submitted all requested documentation, including damage estimates and the official police report for the collision.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has officially started with a review of all submitted evidence.
The claim investigation has been completed; the findings have now been passed to the settlement team for review.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the assessment of the vehicle damages and liability established.
I provided feedback on the settlement offer and expressed my satisfaction with the professionalism during the process.
My auto accident claim was approved for the proposed settlement amount by the insurance company.
The insurance payment has been issued to cover the vehicle repair costs as agreed in the settlement.
The claim has been officially closed following the completion of payment and confirmation of repair scheduling.
